name: Chess Boxing - A Ludwig Game Jam Game
name_original: Chess Boxing - A Ludwig Game Jam Game
description:
A quick Chess Game with a twist--when a capture occurs, the involved pieces need to complete a boxing match to see which one will remain on the square.

Ludwig must beat his opponent and escape in order to get back to Coots.

Gameplay is pretty hit or miss--you're likely to experience positions that confuse the engine, leaving it paralyzed. If this happens, feel free to take another move (there are no arbitrators to stop you!)

Credits:

Chess Board & Pieces: https://dani-maccari.itch.io/pixel-chess

Chess Engine: https://stockfishchess.org
